Education

Shamsipour Technical and Vocational University

BS, Software Enginnering

2006 - 2010

Shamsipour Technical and Vocational College is one of the higher education centers in Tehran, Iran. Before the 1979 revolution, it was being called "Tehran Institute of Technology", which changed to "[Martyr] Shamsipour Technical University " after Hossein Ali Shamsipour.

I surveied multiple and different face recognition algorithms. My professor customized CVQ algorithm as face recognition algorithm. I improved it with neural networn( train and recalculating to decrese wrong rate), Also implemnented it with Java (Standard Edition) and tested it with ORL, MIT, Yale face data sets.
